Proficiency in embedded real-time operating systems (RTOS), device drivers, and hardware abstraction layers (HAL).      Strong understanding of communication protocols and standards, including CAN, Ethernet, Modbus, Websocket, etc. , .      Experience with embedded security principles, cryptography, and secure boot mechanisms.      Familiarity with software development tools, version control systems (e. g. , Git), and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.      Excellent problem-solving skills, analytical thinking, and attention to detail.      Effective communication skills, with the ability to collaborate with multidisciplinary teams and present technical concepts to stakeholders.      Passion for sustainability, clean energy, and electric vehicle technology.            Preferred Qualifications:       Good understanding of vehicle communication protocols (e. g. , CAN, LIN, Ethernet) and automotive networking standards (e. g. , AUTOSAR, ISO 26262).      Experience with EV charging protocols and standards, such as OCPP, ISO 15118, and CHAdeMO.      Knowledge of power electronics, control systems, and battery management systems (BMS).      Familiarity with agile software development methodologies (e. g. , Scrum, Kanban).      Contributions to open-source projects or participation in relevant industry forums and communities.        Advanced degree (e. g. , PhD) or professional certifications in relevant fields     This position includes the following roles and responsibilities:        Lead the design, architecture, and implementation of embedded software for EV charging stations, including firmware development and system integration.      Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including hardware engineers, firmware engineers, and product managers, to define software requirements and ensure alignment with overall product objectives.      Develop and maintain embedded software components, drivers, and protocols to support communication interfaces, such as CAN, Ethernet, and wireless technologies.      Optimize software performance, reliability, and security through code reviews, debugging, profiling, and testing methodologies.      Research and evaluate emerging technologies, tools, and standards to enhance the functionality and efficiency of EVSE embedded systems.      Provide technical leadership, mentorship, and guidance to junior engineers, fostering a culture of innovation, collaboration, and continuous learning.      Participate in the full software development lifecycle, from concept and design to testing and deployment, adhering to established coding standards and best practices.      Support product certification and compliance activities, including safety standards (e. g. , UL, IEC), regulatory requirements, and industry protocols (e. g. , OCPP).              Lead the creation and implementation of embedded software solutions to meet business and infrastructure needs (based on functional/nonfunctional requirements).      Coordinate with application architects to validate solution designs with a focus on the reliability and stability of the product.      Facilitate cross-team technical knowledge sharing forums (e. g. Anchor Engineer meetings, EV Common Libraries, etc. , ).      Experience in integrated testing across the entire system ecosystem to ensure end-to-end product quality.      Provide input on product discovery, estimation, planning and prioritization.      Develop solutions with architects to ensure interoperability of interfacing external and internal systems and develop prototypes to validate.      Interact with external and internal technical peers (Product Managers, Product Designers, Software Engineers, Architects, and vendors).      Focus on the security of the EV services and ensure proper tooling is in place to fix vulnerabilities and detect threats.      Design and implement security protocols to protect vehicle/iOT data and ensure the privacy and safety of users.      Collaborate with hardware engineers, product managers, and other stakeholders to integrate software solutions with vehicle systems and connected ecosystem.      Drive innovation in connected vehicle technologies, exploring advancements in areas such as Intelligent Energy Management.      Optimize connected smart device software for performance, reliability, and scalability while considering the constraints of connected IOT systems.      Participate in the code review process, ensuring adherence to coding standards and high-quality software delivery. Ownership of projects starting from inception to completion.         Individual contributor         Responsibilities :         Practice Leadership: Lead and grow our Salesforce practice by defining the strategic vision, identifying market opportunities, and developing service offerings that align with client needs.         Client Engagement: Serve as a trusted advisor to our clients, understanding their business objectives, and providing strategic guidance on how Salesforce can drive value for their organizations.         Project Delivery: Oversee the end-to-end delivery of Salesforce projects, ensuring that projects are delivered on time, within scope, and to the highest quality standards.         Best Practices: Define and maintain Salesforce best practices, standards, and methodologies for project delivery, solution design, and implementation.         Sales Support: Collaborate with the sales team in pre-sales activities, including solution scoping, proposal development, and client presentations.         Stay Current: Stay updated on the latest Salesforce features, releases, and industry trends to provide thought leadership and ensure our practice remains at the forefront of innovation.         Technical Skills :         Salesforce Expertise: In-depth knowledge and hands-on experience with various Salesforce products and services, including Salesforce Sales Cloud, Salesforce Service Cloud, Salesforce Marketing Cloud, Salesforce Community Cloud and Salesforce Platform (including Lightning Platform)         Salesforce Certifications: Salesforce Certified Technical Architect or Salesforce Certified Application Architect is highly desirable.         Integration: Experience with Salesforce integrations using REST/SOAP APIs, middleware tools, and data migration strategies.         Solution Design: Proven experience in designing scalable, customizable, and efficient Salesforce solutions.         Team Leadership: Demonstrated ability to lead and manage a team of Salesforce professionals, fostering a collaborative and high-performance culture.         Client Management: Strong client relationship management skills, including the ability to understand and address client needs, manage expectations, and provide exceptional service.         Qualifications :         Experience: Minimum of 10 years of experience in IT, with at least 6+ years of hands-on experience in Salesforce implementations and 2+ years in a leadership or management role.         Salesforce Certifications: Salesforce Certified Technical Architect (CTA) or Salesforce Certified Application Architect (CAA) certification is highly preferred.         Leadership: Proven leadership experience in a Salesforce practice, with the ability to set strategic direction, drive growth, and mentor teams. column1: Product Manager For Cloud Platform Automation
column2: Ready to re-imagine the product management role? At IBM, as an Offering Manager, you are responsible for the full lifecycle of an offering: from validating need to determining the business model and defining the solution requirements. Going beyond the traditional focus of timetables and budgets, you use your keen insights into what customers want in their own business plan - and work across disciplines to build the best solutions to a problem. If being the CEO of your offering excites you, consider an offering management career at IBM. Your Role and Responsibilities As a Product Manager in IBM Cloud, you will focus on collecting feedback from customers and staying current on competitors and market trends around the tools and technologies that automate development and delivery of applications. Using this knowledge, you will set business plans, work with development leaders to define product roadmaps, and drive messaging to the market. You will collect feedback from customers and monitor business results to refine priorities. The Platform Automation portfolio includes infrastructure-as-code, CI/CD, security (e.g. software composition analysis, vulnerability management), and dynamic configuration tools. Required Technical and Professional Expertise 5+ years' experience in Product Management or equivalent practical experience building or deploying products in a Cloud based software organization. Understanding of product management lifecycle and practices Has a challenging mindset that will question processes and procedures and constantly strive to simplify and improve delivery and increase speed to market. Able to work autonomously and take balanced decisions. Strong communicator able to manage a wide audience at all levels of the organization through delivering simple and business driven messages. Strong analytical and commercial skills with ability to bring these to bear in all decision making. Positive can-do mind-set that is undaunted by challenges and relishes fixing and improving processes Good customer facing skills and able to manage client expectations. Able to build broad relationships and coalitions across the organization and to align different stakeholder to a common goal and vision. Excellent written and oral communication skills, including experience in high-level business discussions and low-level technical discussions. Understanding of cloud offering capabilities and security, compliance and regulatory landscape for IBM Cloud. Practical knowledge of GTM strategy and working with marketing and sales. Track record of high-quality, self-directed, timely execution, and attention to detail. Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise None

column2: Your responsibilities Together with the team of offering managers, you are responsible for the further development of our portfolio around the Application Maintenance, Support and Modernization for SAP (SAP AMS).         You are the driver who also takes an end-to-end view in the design of your offering, ranging from ERP or S/4HANA project implementations and the corresponding transformations of the enterprise architecture to cloud-based SAP operation.     Your tasks include the determination and clarification of current and possible future requirements for the processes around SAP AMS, the definition and (further) development of suitable services, the definition of marketable service levels and efficient delivery models, as well as the selection of appropriate partners and suitable tools.     This requires continuous coordination with Sales and close cooperation between the AMS Delivery Units so that SAP Applications Management can be successfully offered on the market and delivered profitably.     In addition, we are specifically interested in your outside view based on your experience at partners and customers outside of T-Systems.     You will be responsible for the creation of related service descriptions, calculation tools, GoToMarket strategies, customer and sales presentations as well as the preparation and implementation of target group-oriented training for Sales and Service Delivery Managers. In addition, you are responsible for planning and implementing measures for the further enhancement of the SAP AMS Offering as part of the Portfolio Strategy & Innovation process and for the complete mapping of the Offering in the current Offering Management Lifecycle tools.       Your profile:        For this position, you must have successfully completed a post graduate degree in management, business information or computer science, with more than 10+ years in SAP consulting.     You have extensive proven knowledge of SAP Application Management Service and Support and the associated processes (e.g. user help desk, incident and problem management and change management).     You have at least 5 years of experience as the responsible Service Manager for AMS services for large customers.     As a result, you have acquired proven expert knowledge in the following areas:      SAP Application Management Services in a factory-based approach with highest SLA requirements      SAP Solution Manager      Automate AMS processes with RPA (Robotic Process Automation) and Bots     DevOps in the SAP context and integration with Application Management and Operation Processes     Good knowledge in the field of Machine Learning for automatic detection, assignment and (partially) automated solution of incidents, as well as in the field of knowledge management or experience in SAP Operations (Managed Services) are an advantage. column2: About ORBCOMM Inc. ORBCOMM is a pioneer in IoT technology, empowering customers with insight to make data-driven decisions that help them optimize their operations, maximize profitability and build a more sustainable future. With 30 years of experience and the most comprehensive solution portfolio in the industry, ORBCOMM enables the management of over a million assets worldwide for a diverse customer base spanning transportation, supply chain, heavy equipment, maritime, natural resources and government. For more information about how ORBCOMM is driving the evolution of industry through the power of data, visit www.orbcomm.com.   A little bit about the role: ORBCOMM is a leading global provider of industrial Internet of Things (IoT) and Machine-to-Machine (M2M) communication solutions that remotely track, monitor and control fixed and mobile assets. We are looking for a  Manager -Firmware.  Roles and Responsibilities:   Provide day to day prioritization and technical guidance to your team. Assess the performance of your team on an ongoing process and own the semi-annual performance review activities for your team. Advise and coach your firmware team on career development and continuous improvement. Establish clear expectations, hold team members accountable and incentivize proactive issue resolution to deliver world class products on time and on budget. Build a strong team with culture of ownership and continuous improvement. Drive and be a strong advocate for software "best practices" for design, coding, testing and configuration management. Working with your staff and peers to deliver FW product development plans, including resourcing, prioritization, schedules, and budget. Working directly with product planners, architects, and your firmware development & verification team to analyse new product definitions, identify FW design requirements. Facilitate all product management aspects of the assigned products including managing the firmware work backlog, schedules and coordinating FW activities across the development teams to accomplish committed milestones. Ensure project roadblocks are identified, corrective action plans identified and executed to closure. Identify and drive to closure process improvement efforts to improve organizational efficiency overtime in the areas of deliverable quality, resource efficiency, code reuse, shift left development, etc. Some projects will include responsibility to engage with external development partners including joint product planning requiring the candidate to manage complex partner relationships.  PLEASE SHARE YOUR UPDATED CV TO  doodi.hanumadevi@orbcomm.com
column11: Embedded Development, Firmware Development, Embedded Software

column1: Software Development Manager - IBM Storage Defender
column2: IBM Storage Defender mission in India Systems Development Lab is looking for Senior Development Manager, who is passionate about and deeply skilled in Data Resiliency & Data Protection. Focus is on SaaS deployments that require Data resilience and comprises of workloads like Enterprise Application and Packages, DBs, Virtual Environments i.e VMs that are to be backed up and restored from Hard Drives, COS, Tapes and vendor specific storage h/w and s/w products (IBM and others a plus). Your Role and Responsibilities You will be leading development/test/performance teams working on various areas of Storage Defender. IBM Storage Defender is a flagship industry-leading Cyber Resiliency platform launched in Y2023. Team has a busy roadmap to further enhance product features, expand ecosystem & thus grow business for IBM. You will be part of a global development team with large groups based in US, Germany and in Pune (India). In addition to personnel management & drive new enhancements, this role will also require to handle issues reported by the customers in the field & work closely with the global stakeholders. This role focuses on ensuring high quality and availability of the product features and components as well as partnering with the Product Management and other Global stakeholders. It will involve collaboration across Software/Hardware/Storage teams, the leadership team on organization wide initiatives, working with external/internal sponsor users and customers during critical situations. Required Technical and Professional Expertise Having experience in Product Engg/Development is a must, apart from that here are some specific expectations:  16+ years of relevant experience of working on Enterprise Class Products, experience in dealing with products that involve system skills will be an added advantage.  Good knowledge of Storage Software, Virtualization and Backup/Restore systems and practices. Excellent people management skills and ability to provide technical guidance to a team of experienced professionals. Experience in leading/managing a team of QA, development and support engineers. Ability to handle multiple scrum teams and scrum of scrums. Proficiency in planning, tracking and supervising outcome-oriented activities during the course of product development and support cycles. Ability to design and implement techniques and processes to collect and report on various metrics related to resourcing, scheduling and release aspects of product development and support activities. Proficiency in tools like gitHub/Jira/RTC/MS-Project is a must. Foster product nnovation. Excellent Communication, people management and leadership skills. Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise Apart from technical skills, some of the foremost requirements are to have someone: who is open to learn and take inputs constructively.  who embraces challenges and doesn't believe in finding faults with team, peers or uplines. It's Ok to err on skills but one need to be open minded towards improvement.  who can balance people, product and process goals. Being open minded is the key to success for these roles.

risks and issues, and take proactive measures to mitigate them     Ensure projects are completed within budget and meet quality standards     Resource Management: Allocate resources effectively to column2: Information Technology at Nestl is a multicultural and diverse team of IT professionals driving the biggest IT operations landscape and digital transformation of the CPG, or Fast-Moving Consumer Goods industry        We enable Nestl to engage with millions of consumers using a product-driven approach with leading technologies and solutions      To join our team, we are looking for people who are curious, courageous, innovative, collaborative and passionate about solving complex problems using new technologies! Together, we make IT possible                    As Global Operations Lead LAN&WiFi at Nestl s Global IT Hub in Bangalore, you ll be responsible for the continuous value delivery of the Platform worldwide      You ll oversee sustain, deployment, retirement and leverage and ensures the effective and efficient operational support of all internally or by a third-party managed platform in scope for the day-to-day delivery of all operational and technical planning, organization, and coordination of all the required services                                   A DAY IN THE LIFE                                        Reporting to the Sr        Global Platform Manager, you will collaborate with Regions, Projects, and the Platform teams to establish and oversee operations policies and strategies across multiple regions      Your role involves ensuring efficient processes, achieving operational goals, and handling strategic planning, resource and budget planning, and performance monitoring      Effective communication with stakeholders, addressing operational challenges, optimizing productivity, ensuring compliance, driving continuous improvement, and providing leadership at the site are all key responsibilities in this role                           Provides oversight in the products run and maintain phase to deliver the committed product business value, while offering input to peers.                                  Offers operations and governance escalation support to ensure service level objectives are met.                                  Ensures optimal service at the right cost and quality, with the ability to right-size resources as needed.                                  Leads the development of operational aspects and ensures their end-to-end integration and value delivery.                                  Participates in assessing external and internal technology capabilities for integration with the existing IT operations environment.                                  Contributes to increasing flexibility by leveraging partners to meet growing business demand and enabling Nestl employees to focus on value-added activities.                                  Fosters transversal skills to support products and ensure operational excellence.                                  Supports and influences the product roadmap, particularly in significant or complex innovation initiatives, by collaborating with Product Owners or the Platform Manager.                                  Provides recommendations on improving the effectiveness, efficiency, and delivery of services through the utilization of emerging technology, technical methods, and methodologies.                                  Ensures fulfillment of contracts and provides input on changes in services and/or contracts, collaborating with Procurement and Vendor Management.                                  Drives continuous improvement in the effectiveness and efficiency of operational support for internally or partner-managed platform services.                                              ARE YOU A FIT?                                          Join a collaborative and dynamic team, with a track record of delivering results in high-pressure environments.                                  Bachelors degree in computer science or related field, with 8+ years of experience in IT Operations within an enterprise/global environment.                                  Strong leadership skills, influencing key stakeholders, and cross-functional team management.                                  Experience in Service Management best practices and establishing standard processes.                                  Proven experience in leading IT operations teams in complex, 24/7 environments.                                  Proficiency in budget planning, effective communication, and working with virtual teams in a global setting.                                  Strong understanding of system engineering, risk management, and architecture standards.                                  Familiarity with both traditional practices (IT service management) and agile methods (e.g., DevOps).                                  Deep understanding of the IT landscape in the relevant functional area.                                  Effective influencing, negotiation, and supplier relationship management skills.                                  Ability to foster collaboration, customer service culture, and work with diverse cultures.                                  Excellent communication and presentation skills for building partnerships with internal and external stakeholders, including service integrators, providers, and vendors globally                                  Proficiency in budget planning and financial management.                                  Strong communication skills at different levels within the organization, including fluency in English.                                  Experience working in a global environment and collaborating with virtual teams.

column2: A career within SAP Consulting services, will provide you with the opportunity to help our clients maximise the value of their SAP investment with offerings that address sales, finance, supply chain, engineering, and human capital     We provide comprehensive consulting, system integration and implementation services across multiple SAP applications, products and technologies     Simply put, we focus on delivering business led, technology enabled change for our clients including industry specific enterprise resource planning and the latest in mobile, analytics and cloud solutions             We are looking for an SAP Fiori consultant with at least 8 years of SAP experience in 3-5 implementation projects and a few upgrade/migration/support projects in S4HANA/BTP environment.      The candidate will work closely with business team in understanding the requirement and work with functional teams to design and implement the UI solution.      The candidate should be able to work independently and to   extend needed technical support to the team.     Strong understanding of SAP UI5 / Fiori architecture, data models, elements, and deployment options.     Having working knowledge and experience on BTP will be an added advantage.     Very good hands on experience in SAP tools like Business Application Studio (BAS), Fiori elements and working experience on GitHub.     Should have sound architectural knowledge in both SAP Fiori Custom Mobility solutions for on premise and cloud platforms to participate in proposing application designs and landscape setup.     Experience in taking the responsibility of end-to-end ownership from Design to Support.     Strong knowledge on Fiori Implementations Extensions with deep understanding of UI5 libraries.     Strong experience with SAPUI5 and/or HTML5 or other Front-end Web Application development frameworks.     Experience in Odata, Gateway service development, SAP Objects would be an added advantage.     Experience in designing and implementing scalable solutions in a large-scale distributed environment.     Support the team in delivery to ensure adherence to quality and scheduling goals.            Partner with business stakeholders to ensure delivered solutions are fit for use and purpose while maintaining high levels of customer satisfaction.     Identify, Improve and optimize opportunities to improve product deployment processes.     Experience in Solution Manager / Focus Build for change management.     Should be able to perform code quality review, performance tuning and debugging to ensure the quality and easy maintenance of development objects.     Excellent Communicational, Interpersonal and Presentation skills.     Lead a team of 5+ members if more than 6 years of experience.       Qualification:    bachelors degree in engineering or Master of Computer Application.   Having an SAP Technical Certification is preferred               Mandatory skill sets- SAP FIORI/UI5. BTP, S4HANA    Qualifications -     B.E. / B.Tech / MCA/ M.E/ M.TECH/ MBA/ PGDM. All qualifications should be in regular full-time mode with no extension of course duration due to backlogs

column2: Project Role : Business Process Architect Project Role Description : Design business processes, including characteristics and key performance indicators (KPIs), to meet process and functional requirements. Work closely with the Application Architect to create the process blueprint and establish business process requirements to drive out application requirements and metrics. Assist in quality management reviews, ensure all business and design requirements are met. Educate stakeholders to ensure a complete understanding of the designs.  Must have skills : Oracle Procurement Cloud Good to have skills : NA Minimum  7.5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : 15 years of fulltime education Summary :As a Business Process Architect, you will be responsible for designing business processes, including characteristics and key performance indicators (KPIs), to meet process and functional requirements. Your typical day will involve working closely with the Application Architect to create the process blueprint and establish business process requirements to drive out application requirements and metrics. You will also assist in quality management reviews and ensure all business and design requirements are met. Additionally, you will educate stakeholders to ensure a complete understanding of the designs.  Roles & Responsibilities: Design and develop business processes, including characteristics and key performance indicators (KPIs), to meet process and functional requirements. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to create the process blueprint and establish business process requirements to drive out application requirements and metrics. Assist in quality management reviews and ensure all business and design requirements are met. Educate stakeholders to ensure a complete understanding of the designs. Provide guidance and support to the development team to ensure successful implementation of business processes. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Strong experience in Oracle Procurement Cloud. Good To Have Skills:Experience in other Oracle Cloud modules such as Financials, Supply Chain Management, and Human Capital Management. Experience in designing and developing business processes, including characteristics and key performance indicators (KPIs), to meet process and functional requirements. Strong understanding of business process management methodologies and tools. Experience in quality management reviews and ensuring all business and design requirements are met. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to educate stakeholders and provide guidance and support to the development team. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 7.5 years of experience in Oracle Procurement Cloud. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science, information technology, or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful solutions. This position is based at our Kolkata office. Qualification 15 years of fulltime education

column2: IT Application Owner is responsible for identifying and Assessing the current state technological infrastructure for gaps or potential improvements using their knowledge of infrastructure solutions and where industry innovations are in their lifecycles. Work includes: Determining the appropriate technological solutions to balance delivery and compliance Identifying gaps in the current infrastructure solutions and implementing the associated improvements whilst ensuring compliance with technical roadmaps Improving the safety and security of IT Applications, compliance with internal and external standards and operational readiness Supporting the banks audit function in the remediation of audit points and issues in order to reduce risk Identifying and assessing IT Application risk and implementing the associated technology measures Contributing and assisting the implementation of policy and strategy specific to IT management and Information Security Identifying opportunities to incorporate new technologies/approaches into best practice Your key responsibilities  You will be maintaining the applications for Credit and Debit Cards. You will ensure availability, stability and performance of the application on Production and Test environments. You will ensure the applications compliance with Deutsche Bank IT policies (i.e. security monitoring, roadmap compliance, access management-SoD, etc), including availability of all necessary application/service knowledge and documentation You will support the Product Owner, Analyst and Scrum Master in terms of application and compliance related topics. You will facilitate Disaster Recovery activities by reviewing DR plans and coordinating the execution of DR exercise for the application. You are responsible for Access and other Infrastructure related topics. Your skills and experience Minimum 3 years experience in a in a similar role. ITIL knowledge would be a plus. Basic technical capabilities and infrastructure knowledge (e.g.: Restful Services, Java, and Cloud Technology, Oracle database, Linux) Experience with Incident Management, IT Service Management, DevOps process workflow, Change Management Experience with Compliance process (i.e. security monitoring, roadmap compliance, access management etc), Experience with tooling across the Software development Lifecycle/DevOps: Jira, HP ALM, Confluence, Artifactory, TeamCity, Git/BitBucket etc.) Strong ability to manage unexpected events; control and deal with them quickly and efficiently. When confronted with a problem, you will need to collect information, analyze situation, point out solutions and apply them to solve perfectly in reasonable time. Pro-active team player with very good communication and excellent English language skills for interacting with stakeholders. Experience with working together with Agile/SCRUM teams and their methods and tooling.

column2: Project Role : Business Process Architect Project Role Description : Design business processes, including characteristics and key performance indicators (KPIs), to meet process and functional requirements. Work closely with the Application Architect to create the process blueprint and establish business process requirements to drive out application requirements and metrics. Assist in quality management reviews, ensure all business and design requirements are met. Educate stakeholders to ensure a complete understanding of the designs.  Must have skills : Retirement Planning Services Good to have skills : Requirements Analysis, Oracle SOA Adminnistration Minimum  3  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : Degree Summary :As a Business Process Architect, you will be responsible for designing business processes, including characteristics and key performance indicators (KPIs), to meet process and functional requirements. Your typical day will involve working closely with the Application Architect to create the process blueprint and establish business process requirements to drive out application requirements and metrics. You will also assist in quality management reviews and ensure all business and design requirements are met. Additionally, you will educate stakeholders to ensure a complete understanding of the designs. In this role, you will play a pivotal role in identifying and driving impactful improvements across our services, helping us deliver exceptional value to our clients as they plan for and navigate their retirement journey  Roles & Responsibilities: Conduct in-depth analysis of business processes, systems, and data to identify opportunities for improvement and optimization. Partner with key stakeholders across the organization to understand needs, challenges, and objectives. Elicit, document, and analyze business requirements for new initiatives, projects, and enhancements. Develop clear and concise user stories and functional specifications. Evaluate potential solutions and technologies, assessing their feasibility, cost-effectiveness, and impact. Collaborate with IT teams to translate business requirements into technical specifications. Manage project scope, timelines, and resources, ensuring projects are delivered on time and within budget. Create and maintain comprehensive documentation, including requirements documents, process maps, and user guides. Present findings and recommendations to stakeholders in a clear and compelling manner. Stay up-to-date on industry trends and best practices in retirement services. Professional & Technical Skills: 3-years of experience as a Business Analyst, preferably in the financial services or retirement services industry. Deep experience/knowledge in more than 2 of the following areas Institutional Servicing (remittance services, plan management, sponsor management), Distributed Transactions (Money In - Money Out , Transaction Mgmt, accumulation-deaccumulation), Offer Selection and Mgmt (Onboarding (plan/sponsor/participant, setup & change ), Education & Advice (Retirement advisory, Financial Wellness), Participant management, Account Management ( Customer Profile, Customer Account information, Saving and Investing), reporting, customer service, Annuity Servicing, Engagement & Distributions (Enrollment and Onboarding), Financial products ( Defined Contributions, Lifetime Investment Solutions) Marketing ( Messaging and Communications).  Working experience on Agile, DevOps. Good to have experience working as a Scrum master.  Working experience on OMNI is preferred.  Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Excellent communication and presentation skills, both written and verbal. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Proficient in MS Office Suite, with experience in data analysis tools preferred. Knowledge of industry regulations and standards related to retirement plans a plus.Financial knowledge: Types of retirement accounts:Deep understanding of various retirement accounts like IRAs, 401(k)s, Roth IRAs, pensions, and health savings accounts (HSAs). Tax implications:Understanding of tax laws and regulations related to retirement savings and distributions. Investment strategies:Familiarity with investment vehicles, asset allocation, and risk management strategies suitable for retirees. Estate planning:Basic understanding of estate planning concepts and their impact on retirement assets. Products and Services:Deep understanding of Retirement product offerings, including annuities, investment accounts, life insurance, and retirement planning tools. Plan rules and regulations:Knowledge of plan specific rules, enrollment procedures, contribution limits, withdrawal options, and loan features. Compliance requirements:Understanding of ERISA, SECURE Act 2.0 and other regulatory requirements governing retirement plans. Data analysis:Ability to analyze plan data to identify trends, assess performance, and informed decision-making. Recordkeeping Systems:Deep understanding of specialized recordkeeping systems used for managing retirement plan data, including participant demographics, contributions, investments, distributions, and benefit payments. Additional Information: Problem-solving and Analytical Skills:Ability to identify and resolve discrepancies in data, investigate missing information, and analyze recordkeeping trends. Project Management:Experience managing recordkeeping-related projects on time and within budget. Attention to Detail:Ability to work meticulously and ensure accuracy in recordkeeping tasks. Qualification Degree

Excellent attention to detail with outstanding verbal and written communication skills. Good technical knowledge and experience in  Big Data  Technology - PySpark, Hadoop,  Hive . Good knowledge on  SQL  queries. Proficient knowledge in Microsoft Excel for data analysis Knowledge of processes including usage of the central release management and quality management systems processes in the SDLC. Knowledge in the field of banking regulation.

column1: Senior Developer Relations & Community Engagement Manager
column2: What Are We Looking For? Contentstack is looking for a  Senior Developer Relations and Community Engagement Manager .  If youre looking for an opportunity to join an innovative, fun, and fast-paced team where your contributions will have a meaningful impact, wed love to hear from you!  This role is designed for someone with a passion for technology and community building and who is eager to develop meaningful relationships within the tech community and enhance the companys growth through strategic community engagement. Roles and Responsibilities: Community Building and Engagement: Led initiatives to build and grow tech communities in domains such as tech, product, design, and marketing. Develop strategies for engaging and retaining a diverse developer community, focusing on areas like Engineering, Management, and Product. Foster cohort expansion and contribute to the company's growth by leveraging community insights. Developer Relations and Ecosystem Development: Manage developer relations for Contentstack, and play a pivotal role in building and nurturing a self-sustaining developer community. This includes organizing and curating conferences focused on Sitecore, AEM, WordPress, Drupal, and other CMS developers,  Create a program for building Contentstack-certified developers, and create a dedicated space for learning, networking, and growth for the community.  Implement and oversee programs like accelerators, developer groups, and expert networks to support the tech ecosystem. Mentor and support early-stage startups, providing guidance and resources to foster innovation and growth. Content and Educational Initiatives: Collaborate with influencers, local developer community leaders, and tech professionals to develop and distribute educational resources and thought leadership content. Create and execute marketing strategies to promote learning resources and community-driven content. Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with marketing, product, and engineering teams to align community engagement strategies with company goals. Engage in global and cross-functional stakeholder management to build a comprehensive and inclusive community strategy. Event Management and Public Speaking: Organize and participate in tech events, workshops, and conferences to enhance community engagement and brand visibility. Deliver talks and presentations on relevant topics for Contentstack, such as composable architecture and scale engineering Qualifications: 10+ years of experience in the web technologies/internet space, with a focus on startups, communities, and developer relations. Proven track record in community building, program management, and stakeholder engagement. Strong technical background with experience in areas like cloud computing, AI, web product development MBA in Marketing, with a prior background in technology is preferred (Not Mandatory)  Excellent communication skills and ability to engage with diverse audiences. Passion for people development, user education, and enabling digital access.

highly proficient    technical and functional expert   , adept at handling complex issue management     We are looking for a dynamic individual with quick and innovative thinking skills, exceptional technical abilities, and a strong business acumen     Your role as a Technical Account Manager will involve leveraging your technology and business intelligence to effectively address and resolve customer challenges     Collaborating with key internal stakeholders from Product, Engineering, Operations, Engagement Management, and Sales teams will be essential to achieve success       The ideal candidate will be a motivated self-learner, deeply enthusiastic about problem-solving, and committed to ensuring our customers success     As our Technical Account Manager, you will hold a crucial position in overseeing all technical aspects of customer engagements     Building strong relationships with our Enterprise customers will be a significant responsibility, guiding them through the implementation, optimization, and expansion of the HeadSpin platform     Your problem-solving expertise and dedication to delivering exceptional service will play a pivotal role in ensuring our customers receive the best possible support and experience     If you have technical experience with Python, Java, Appium, Selenium and can read scripts - wed love to hear from you              What you've Done Before                     As an accomplished Technical Account Manager in the SaaS and software testing industry, you have consistently excelled in managing technical client relationships and driving customer satisfaction     Your track record includes successfully leading onboarding and implementation processes for clients onto SaaS platforms and software products, ensuring seamless adoption and user satisfaction     You have provided expert technical consultation and support to clients, adeptly troubleshooting complex issues and delivering effective solutions     Through conducting product training sessions and workshops, you have empowered clients to fully utilize platform features for optimal results     Your ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, including support, engineering, and product management, has enabled you to advocate for clients and facilitate prompt issue resolution     You have a proven track record of identifying upselling and cross-selling opportunities based on clients evolving needs, thereby contributing to revenue growth     You are well-versed in monitoring key performance metrics and analyzing client data to provide valuable, data-driven insights that drive continuous improvements in your clients testing processes     Your experience in managing multiple client accounts simultaneously demonstrates your commitment to delivering exceptional service and adhering to project timelines     When handling client escalations, you approach conflicts with tact and diplomacy, ensuring resolution that strengthens client relationships and exceeds expectations     Your technical acumen allows you to understand and effectively articulate complex technical concepts to diverse audiences, further enhancing client engagement and satisfaction              What you'll Do                         Technical Consultation:             Provide expert guidance on utilizing our platform effectively, including setup, configuration, and optimization for testing scenarios.         Assist clients with troubleshooting technical issues, working collaboratively with our support and engineering teams to resolve problems promptly.             Product Onboarding and Training:             Guide clients through the onboarding process, ensuring a smooth transition onto HeadSpin s platform.         Conduct training sessions and workshops for clients, helping them understand HeadSpin s features and best practices for testing.             Client Relationship Management:             Establish and nurture strong relationships with clients, acting as the primary point of contact for all technical inquiries and concerns.         Conduct regular check-ins with clients to understand their business objectives and offer tailored solutions to address their challenges effectively.             Project Management:             Oversee the successful implementation of HeadSpins solutions within clients workflows.         Collaborate with internal project teams to define project scopes, timelines, and deliverables.         Provide regular status updates to clients during project execution, ensuring expectations are managed effectively.             Performance Analysis:             Monitor and analyze clients usage patterns and testing results on our platform, identifying areas for improvement and efficiency.         Present reports on key performance metrics to clients, providing valuable insights to optimize their testing processes.             Customer Advocacy:             Act as the voice of our clients within the organization, advocating for their needs and feedback to improve our platform and services.         Collaborate with product management and development teams to relay client requirements and contribute to product enhancements.             Escalation Management:             Handle client escalations with professionalism, ensuring timely resolution and effective communication throughout the process.                   What You Need                     7 - 10 years proven experience in a client-facing technical role, such as Technical Account Management, Customer Success, or Solutions Engineering, preferably in the SaaS or software testing industry for enterprise clients         Bachelors degree in a relevant technical field or equivalent experience. Customer-centric mindset with a passion for ensuring clients success and satisfaction.

column2: Gravweb Solution is looking for Social Media Strategist to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      As a social media strategist, your role is to develop and execute strategies to effectively promote and enhance the online presence of a brand or organization across various social media platforms      You are responsible for creating engaging content, managing social media campaigns, analyzing data, and driving audience growth and engagement      Here are the key responsibilities and tasks typically associated with being a social media strategist:      Strategy Development: You develop social media strategies aligned with the brand's goals and target audience      This involves researching and understanding the target market, identifying key platforms, defining content themes and messaging, and setting goals and KPIs      Content Creation: You create compelling and relevant content for social media platforms, including text, images, videos, and graphics      This content should be tailored to each platform and optimized to engage the target audience and drive desired actions      Community Management: You manage the brand's social media communities by monitoring comments, messages, and interactions      You engage with followers, respond to inquiries and feedback, and foster a positive and authentic brand image      Social Media Advertising: You develop and implement paid advertising campaigns on social media platforms to reach a wider audience, increase brand awareness, and drive conversions      This involves setting budgets, targeting specific demographics, and monitoring campaign performance      Analytics and Reporting: You analyze social media data and metrics to evaluate the effectiveness of campaigns and content      You track key performance indicators, such as reach, engagement, click-through rates, and conversions, and provide regular reports and insights to the stakeholders

column2: Regional Finance Development Program (RFDP) identifies top early-in-career talent and accelerates their development across APAC countries and different parts of the business, enabling them to be key contributors to our companyambition and purpose, Doing now what patients need next       Recognizing the central importance of experiential learning and development, Regional Finance Development Program provides a platform to strengthen a broad regional network and to gain experience and skills in different areas that will be vital for a career in Finance     We want you to reach your full potential by stretching assignments and doing rotations in different exciting roles     You will be part of transforming Finance and making it ready for the future            What we offer you             The opportunity to build skills and capabilities in a variety of functions in APAC, roles, projects and locations during a 2 to 2.5 years time period. From Affiliate to Roche Services Solutions (RSS), from Pharmaceuticals to Diagnostics .          Post the program, you are fully empowered to assess opportunities and decide on your further career with Roche.          Mobility support is provided wherever thatneeded. Inspiring peers and thought leaders, and broad personal support by your Program Manager, a Rotation Manager, and a Senior Leader Mentor.          Lifelong learning is part of our strategy; you will receive on-the-job training, formal leadership self-directed learning, and will learn through targeted mentoring coaching, and other networking resources.
